co2.docs:
The information for the CO₂ sensor. Readings in parts per million (ppm).
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SM300D2 7-in-1 Air Quality Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sm300d2.html#configuration-variables)*
